title: Celebrating Einstein
description:
Join Neil deGrasse Tyson, comic co-host Chuck Nice, and astrophysicist Janna Levin as they celebrate the life and achievements of Albert Einstein and his impact on the scientific world around us including the detection of gravitational waves at LIGO.
NOTE: StarTalk All-Access subscribers can watch or listen to this entire episode commercial-free here: https://www.startalkradio.net/all-access/celebrating-einstein/
Credit: Ferdinand Schmutzer, Public Domain via Wikimedia Commons.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
